description:
The Fantastic Beasts Expansion augments Knights of Braveland with a number of fearsome new bosses. In addition, you will now be able to play as a new hero, the mighty Wizard, who can defeat fantastic beasts with hunter's gear.

Features:
3 new bosses: The Werewolf, The Ogre, and The Crab King
11 whimsical weapons and equipment items from the armory of a beast hunter
A new hero joins the fray: the Wizard

Original Knights of Braveland game required.
name: Knights of Braveland: Fantastic Beasts
